ygData.subject: Re: Genni?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, this is actually light enough to move with.  Just as a marker, I have on several occasions made a High Keep/RV/Commons/NRo/Freeport run with six backpacks
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, this is actually light enough to move with. Just as a marker, I have on
several occasions made a High Keep/RV/Commons/NRo/Freeport run with six
backpacks full of armor (I'm a smith, plus I have to get rid of all that HK
bronze somehow, too), and even with an encumbrance of around 230 (str 96) I can
still run noticeably faster than normals (with Selo's and a drum). When I was
younger and tailoring (before people realized that ruined pelts were worth
something) I would visit all of the inns in Commons and fill eight backpacks
with them. Even at encumbrances of near 300 I could still move (but only with
Selo's active).

Just for amusement, convert all of your plat to copper sometime when you're at
the bank and check out your encumbrance. 24000/96, agility 1. hehe.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 30 songs (still), Innoruuk


kim@... wrote:
>
> From: kim@...
>
> On Tue, 26 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
> >
> > Heheh - dearest sister - I don't care if you twist chant, anthem, warsong
> > and selo's - with 3210gp you would NOT be able to walk to the door much
> > less run to somewhere in Rathe Mts - not even with a MM drum. But I am sure
> > someone will try! <g>
>
> Bah, it's about 81 pounds. You can run with it just fine.
> With Accelerando and a drum, you'll probably still be faster
> than SoW unencumbered (with a MM drum you definitely will be).
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
